title: The Melbourne Wedding Belle
creator_contributor_role: Australia. Dept. of the Interior. Film Division, production company
Australian National Film Board, production company
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Melbourne (Vic.) - Description and travel
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Melbourne (Vic.) - Social life and customs
abstract: Produced by the Department of the Interior's Australian National Film Board in 1954, this cheerful short film promotes Melbourne as it gears up for the staging of the 1956 Olympics.
description: Set to a poetic musical dialogue, this film shows the beauty of Melbourne and gardens as the bride, groom etc gather for a wedding at St John's Church in Toorak (Melbourne).
